title: A Strategic Meeting at the Pool!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Haa~, it feels great~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Fufu, Honoka-chan, even though this is a pool you look like you just went into a bath<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>That means going in hot water when it’s cold and going in cold water when it’s hot feel just as good as each other, right~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>That’s true, if you ask “Which one feels better between the two of them?”, you probably won’t get an answer<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ah, Hanayo-chan, look! That floater is so cool!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>It really is! It seems really hard to pump air into a floater that big….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>….Huh, I wonder if we can use that for our next live?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>For a live!? ….As a concept, it might just work…. Hey, let’s take a picture and send it to everyone later<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>How about we take the entire pool as a concept and apply it for our stage!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>That sounds fun! Then, let’s take lots of pictures of the entire pool too! Let’s go, Honoka-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
